##The new crown disease is keeping them in the cold spring of 2020 forever

Postlate

Function description, later, better. This is "Caijing" magazine and small evening team launched a new brand. All first-hand interviews, no second-hand information. Be Your most trusted business news outlet.

![img](data:image/jpeg;base64,)
Chinese parasol tree planted by academician Duan Zhengcheng

They are distinguished researchers and tireless educators. They are the brothers, husbands, mothers and fathers of the family who should not have left in the spring of 2020.

By Chen Jing and Guan Yiwen, CAIJING reporters

Editor | Song Wei

According to the WHO, as of 6:00 on March 3,2020, the new coronavirus had claimed 3,110 lives worldwide, and the number is increasing as the epidemic spreads around the world.

Every life lost to an epidemic should be remembered. At the center of the storm, the Huazhong University of Science and Technology in Wuhan, Hubei Province, died less than 20 days after the outbreak began in February 2020, their departure is either directly or indirectly linked to the epidemic.

Professor Lin Zhengbin of the Tongji Medical College is the third medical worker in China to be infected with the new coronavirus, and Wuhan had not yet reported "human-to-human transmission" of the virus at the time he might have been infected. Academician Duan Zhengcheng of the Mechanical Institute kept a low profile throughout his life. Before he left, he told people around him that it might be too late to see the results of the projects at hand.

Professor Hong Ling, of the School of life sciences and technology, died three days after being diagnosed with the new coronavirus. His wife is still at home keeping a light on his side. Professor Ke Huibing of the School of sociology was only 41 years old when he died. The optimistic and gentle teacher had a malignant tumor and died of a suspected new coronavirus infection several days after isolation.

Liu Xiaoxian, a professor at the Public Health at Tongji Medical College who founded China's first undergraduate program in maternal and child health, died on February 13,2020, he was a member of the Expert Committee on policy and management of the Ministry of Health.

A member of the Huazhong University of Science and Technology told Caijing that Liu had not been infected with the new coronavirus before his death, but because his own disease had not been treated effectively, "But this outbreak has put a relative strain on medical resources and has also had an impact on patients with other conditions. "

Hongling, Lin Zhengbin, Duan Zhengcheng and Ke Huibing, the four professors who left because of the new coronavirus, all had lived in their beloved Huazhong University. Their stories deserve to be remembered and written. When the epidemic is over and thousands of students reenter Hcu, they will know that several dear teachers have left us in the disaster.

1

Chinese Academy of Engineering Member Duan Zhengcheng:

"though he was gone, he was still alive. "

Huazhong University of Science and Technology, professor, academician of Chinese Academy of Engineering, Duan Zhengcheng

In 1953, at the foot of Yujia Mountain in Wuchang, Wuhan, the former Huazhong University of Science and Technology was officially established, and began to enroll students.

This was the year after Duan moved to Wuhan from Zhenjiang, Jiangsu Province. At the age of 19, Duan became the first student of Huazhong University of Technology. Four years later, Duan graduated from the Department of Mechanical Engineering and has been teaching there ever since. From a farmland to a school building, and now the central China University, Duan Zhengcheng accompanied the school through a complete 67 years from scratch.

On February 15,2020, at 19:35 am, the companion picture was on rest as I was hospitalized with fever on January 27, was diagnosed with novel coronavirus two days later, and was admitted to ICU on February 11,2020, however, the situation suddenly deteriorated on the afternoon of the 15th and he died at 19:35 am in Wuhan on the same day.

The funeral of Duan Zhengcheng was simplified and no funeral ceremony was held. An online memorial hall with Duan Zhengcheng's name Pinyin as its domain name was launched on the evening of the 15th, hundreds of messages of condolence and condolence were sent from government leaders, experts in the field, teachers, students, alumni and various sectors of society to commemorate the old man who devoted his life to the cause of central China University and Mechanical Engineering.

January 27 to February 15, the 20 days for all the students, friends and relatives, is a torturous.

Zhou Jialin is Duan Zhengcheng's graduate student, the doctor student, knows more than 30 years, two families are very familiar. Because in New Zealand, Zhou Jialin can only pass section of the teacher's daughter and his teacher younger brother to understand his condition.

"that morning (after Duan Zhengcheng's death) , (I) woke up at 7:00 a.m. , and my wife said Duan's daughter sent something, and the three of US started to cry. " On the seventh day of Duan Zhengcheng's life, Zhou Jialin took out his mobile phone and pointed it in the direction of China, he and his wife made three deep bows.

Officially, Duan holds many titles -- as a member of the Chinese Communist Party, an expert in mechanical engineering and an academician of the Chinese Academy of Engineering, professor, Faculty of Mechanical Science and Engineering, Huazhong University of Science and Technology, Ph. D. Supervisor, chief scientist, National Engineering Research Center for digitalization of manufacturing equipment.

But he did not care about these titles. He once said, "the highest administrative position in my life is the director of the Mechanical Automation Teaching and Research Office. " Duan Zhengcheng's teaching and research office has gone from five academicians to the Party Committee secretary and President of four key universities, they include Shao Xinyu, the current party secretary of the Huazhong University of Science and Technology, who was also elected to the Chinese Academy of Engineering in 2019.

Duan Zhengcheng's close friend of more than 30 years, Shu Xiao, told Caijing that Duan Zhengcheng did not apply for the fellowship until he was 74 and was successful once, because he could not do it again after 75.

Duan played down the coveted title of academician, saying, "if it wasn't for the honor of the school and the team, I wouldn't have applied. "

Professor Central China Normal University, who has undertaken the "Data Collection Project on the academic growth of veteran scientists" sponsored by the China Association for Science and Technology, has conducted eight official interviews with Duan Zhengcheng since April 2018, and has conducted six so far, "At first he didn't want to do it, thinking it was propaganda. He accepted it only after being explained to him several times by relevant departments and college leaders that it was a scientific research project. ".

In Liu Zhongxing's impression, Duan Zhengcheng kept a very low profile. After the interview, Duan Zhengcheng also repeatedly stressed to him, "It is important to Seek truth from facts, not to raise the bar, not to advertise, but to reflect more on his team, more on the students, more on the school. It is important to stress that all achievements are not a matter for him alone, but a matter for the team, a matter for the college. "

Shuxiaoduan Zhengcheng is a major feature of evaluation is both hands-on and brain, "old section of the lathe workers to 8 level, this is the highest. " Duan Zhengcheng has a famous saying, "to write the article in the motherland on the earth, write to the workshop. ".

As a young man, Duan Zhengcheng used to lie down in workshops for months at a time, recalls Huang Yu, a student of Duan Zhengcheng. Duan Zhengcheng developed two production lines for FAW. He worked in Shanghai, Shiyan and other places for seven or eight years, many Times in Wuhan home without entering.

Every study Duan led took a very long time, 10 years to develop a "whole-body gamma knife" that can kill tumor cells, and 20 years to develop key technologies and equipment for laser processing, it took 30 years to continuously perfect the high-performance high-precision and high-efficiency grinding machine for automobile engine crankshaft.

He often said that, "to do research to bear the lonely, can not be outside a pulse, you have to oscillate. "

Before contracting the new coronavirus, Duan was working on a proton radiotherapy device for most cancer patients. The Proton knife is much more technically complex and tens of times more expensive than the full-body gamma knife.

Duan Zhengcheng has been involved in research for nearly four years, he had said to Zhou Jialin and others, he may not have time to see the results of the project out.

For more than 60 years, Duan has trained 32 doctoral students and six postdocs, which is not a high "yield" compared with other professors. "It might take him four or five years to graduate, " Zhou told CAIJING. "I didn't know how many times I had to change it. He was very strict, and being his student required a strong heart. "

This kind of strict let Zhou Jialin benefit greatly, in addition to the work ability enhancement, the psychological bearing ability also became strong. Zhou Jialin said, "every time I report something to Duan Lao, I will come up with no less than three plans to discuss with him, this plan was rejected by him, I said there is another one, you say I have another one, otherwise I can not pass. But it will allow you to be the best of the best, the best of the best."

Although strict to the students, private Li Duan is a very kind old man. Jie Wen has been in school on the course, in his impression, the teacher is particularly bright, "have his local talk more, he is the core of the crowd, the voice and Sonorous, has been laughing constantly. ".

Duan Zhengcheng is a famous Mechanical College "Iron Mouth" , he can speak, thinking agile, logical strong. Not only can say, Duan Zhengcheng also can "play" , 1.8 meters tall, he was the first captain of the School Basketball Team in college, playing guard, and led the basketball team to win the championship in Hubei Province.

Not only can he say he can fight, but Duan Zhengcheng is also a master of fighting. "The earliest teacher Duan lived in a small two-story house where the Chinese workers lived, " Zhou recalled. "Duan would buy all kinds of components and assemble his own TV. "

When Duan Zhengcheng was hard up for money, he had a full range of shoe repair tools at home. The soles of his family and friends'shoes were nailed on by his own hands. He was also a good cook. His specialty was Lion's head.

Liu also remembers going to Duan Zhengcheng's home in November 2019 to interview his wife, Teacher Wan. She said her husband was very serious and that the results were always around the needs of the state and society.

Liu Zhongxing told the CAIJING reporter that WAN is the head of the central China senior citizens'chorus and sings very well. He can also sing in Russian, "At a party in Hubei Province, the old couple also performed together on the stage, singing a duet of the trackers' love. "

Next to the old campus of Huazhong University of Science and Technology, Duan Zhengcheng planted a sycamore tree, the second tree in the southwest corner to the north. He and the plane tree together, accompanied the land of people grow up and old, past, present, future.

This epidemic has taken a lot of lives that shouldn't have been taken. Had it not been for this sudden outbreak, Duan Zhengcheng would have spent a reunion Spring Festival, continued to participate in the Proton knife project research, and went to the faculty canteen for a bowl of hot, dry noodles at lunch time, in his spare time, he went to the youth garden to shoot the scenery and see the Platanus × Hispanica he had planted. As usual, it was ordinary and beautiful.

After Duan Zhengcheng left, his old friend Shu Xiao was still sending him messages on Wechat. "I am very sad. Even though he left, he is still alive and living in our hearts. He is a truly ordinary and great man. "

2

Lin Zhengbin, professor, Tongji Hospital, Tongji Medical College:

"A good doctor is gone. "

Professor, Tongji Hospital, Tongji Medical College, Tongji Medical College

Lin Zhengbin

At 11:00 on February 10, Tongji Hospital, affiliated to Tongji Medical College, died at the age of 62 from pneumonia. He was deputy director of the hospital's transplant research institute physician, infection has been working in the hospital on duty, from the diagnosis of new pneumonia to death, between less than half a month. Before he died, he texted co-workers, "I'm on a machine. Help me. "

According to the health times, Lin found his colleague Song Jianxin, director of the Department of infection and a member of the Expert Group on Epidemic Prevention and control in Hubei Province, years ago. At the time, Lin had been suffering from low fever and cough for several days.

Lin Zhengbin had already undergone isolation treatment at home on Jan. 24, a colleague at the Organ Transplant Institute told Southern Metropolis Daily, he was quarantined for some time and did not feel better until he was hospitalized around January 27.

According to the 14-day incubation period of the virus, Lin Zhengbin may have been infected with the virus around January 10. At the time, doctors at Tongji Hospital were not aware of the severity of the outbreak. On January 20, Chinese Academy of Engineering Academician Zhong Nanshan made it clear that there was "human-to-human transmission" of the new coronavirus.

"CAIJING" reporters learned that Tongji Hospital in 2020 after New Year's Day to activate the medical staff of the three-level protection, but Song Jianxin told reporters, "not all hospital start. "

According to the guidelines for field protection for Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome personnel (trial) issued by the Ministry of Health in 2003, three-level protection is mainly applicable to personnel who collect throat swabs from suspected and clinically diagnosed cases.

Lin's transplant institute is not part of a three-tier protection program. Chen Zhishui, director of the Organ Transplantation Research Institute, told reporters that Lin Zhengbin had been carrying out outpatient service and ward rounds in the department before infection and had not been transferred to the fever clinic for support. For the cause of infection, Chen Zhishui said "hard to say. ". He believes that the source of infection may come from outpatient, "the beginning of the surgical collective physical examination, outpatient also more. ". It could have come from outside the hospital.

Before he was hospitalized, Lin was never sure he was infected. "strange, I wouldn't have that infectious pneumonia, " he said, until Song looked at his CT results and told him, "it's very possible. "

To Song's surprise, Lin's condition deteriorated rapidly and he was admitted to the intensive-care unit within a week of his hospitalization. On the suction machine, Lin Zhengbin once to Song Jianxin Message: "Director Song, I on the suction machine, save me. "

Lin Zhengbin's college roommate, Dr. Shu Tao, chief of cardiac surgery at the First Affiliated Hospital of Xiamen University, was shocked and puzzled by the news that Lin Zhengbin had died after his rapidly deteriorating condition. "The news suddenly knocked people unconscious. "

In shutao's memory, Lin Zhengbin was a member of the school football team during his college days, "playing great football. ". He also likes to run, the school playground can always see his vigorous posture. "His body is not supposed to be compromised, " he said.

Chen Zhishui said that the reason why the rapid turn to severe within a week, may be infected with the virus, personal immunity, in addition to the initial awareness of the virus is not clear enough. However, Chen said, "I have never heard of him before any basic disease. "

Lin Zhengbin died, his son, daughter-in-law also infected with the new coronavirus, but Chen Zhishui said the two are now "in good condition. ". At present, Tongji Hospital affiliated to Tongji Medical College is still infected with health care workers, there is no infection of critical health care workers.

In the eyes of Chen Zhishui, Lin zhengbin usually modest, practical work, "good to the patient. " For the work in the institute, has always been hard-working. "If you leave it to him, it will all be done properly and without complaint. "

As the timing of organ transplantation is critical, the operation is not waiting for others. As soon as a donor organ is available, it is necessary to arrange an operation for the recipient. For Lin Zhengbin, midnight on temporary surgery, all over the country for business organs, surgery is normal work. "He did a lot of hard work, hard work. "

The second year after the resumption of the Gaokao, Shu Tao and Lin Zhengbin began their five-year college years at Tongji Medical College, the predecessor of the Tongji Medical College.

At the time, Lin was two or three years older than his four or five roommates. To them, Lin was like a big brother. Shu Tao also remembers that Lin Zhengbin tried to take care of his roommates in every aspect of his life.

In the 1970s, everyone was living in poverty. The 11-yuan scholarship was a living allowance for his classmates. "I never saw him wearing any good clothes. ". Lin Zhengbin, a native of Wuhan, would also invite roommate to his home to entertain him.

Lin comes from an ordinary working class family with two older brothers. He is the third in line. In shutao's memory, Lin Zhengbin was the oldest child in the family. He went to university by self-study, and after graduating in 1983, he stayed in the Organ Transplantation Research Institute of Tongji Hospital, affiliated to Tongji Medical College, for more than 30 years.

The Tongji Medical College, formerly known as the Abdominal Surgery Laboratory, was founded in 1965 by Professor Qiu Fazu, an academician of the Chinese Academy of Sciences and "father of Chinese surgery" . In 1977, Tongji Hospital took charge of the research office. In 1982, the research office completed the first simple pancreas transplantation in China. In 1989, the first living relative spleen was successfully transplanted here.

It's not easy to stay in one of the top scientific institutions in the country. Shu Tao remember, college, Lin Zhengbin is the students between the "excellent" , we go back to the dormitory at noon, he is still learning in the classroom. The winter in Wuhan is uncomfortably cold. Lin Zhengbin and the students are up at four or five in the morning, wrapped in a military coat to go to the classroom to study.

"He went to the countryside and kept studying during that period, so once he grasped the opportunity to study, he treasured it, " said Shu, lin Zhengbin is not the kind of people who will talk about the ideal of life, but for medical research has been very insistent, after work and Lin Zhengbin chat, most of his patients and scientific research.

In shutao's eyes, Lin Zhengbin is a very patriotic and a sense of justice. After working, Lin Zhengbin once went to Kanazawa Medical University in Japan for further study, after the completion of his study, he chose to return to China. He retired in 2017 and was rehired as an expert in kidney transplantation, post-operative management and critical care, as well as in the application of new immunosuppressants and the development of organ preservation solutions.

Lin zhengbin occasionally to Xiamen business meetings, will take Wuhan Specialty to see Shutao. Although the last time and Lin Zhengbin met more than 10 years ago, Shutao can still remember his gentle, calm appearance, did not expect to hear from him again, is he died of a new coronavirus infection. "It's so sudden. He's come a long way, and a good doctor is gone. "

3

Professor Hung Ling, College of Life Science and Technology:

"The pneumonia seems to be getting worse,

You all go home early."

Professor, professor, Huazhong University of Science and Technology

Red Ling

At 10:45 p.m. on February 7,2020, Professor Hong Ling's wife received a phone call from the Wuhan Union Hospital. She was told that professor Hong Ling had died. Just three hours earlier, she had asked if she had eaten, red Ling gave him a "OK" look.

The sickness came on the mountain. During the Spring Festival, Red Ling and his wife have been infected with the new coronavirus symptoms, because Red Ling has diabetes, the condition is more serious than his wife. But there was no nucleic acid test can not be hospitalized, and waited for several days, finally on February 5, the family received a "good news" : NUCLEIC ACID test positive, can be hospitalized.

That morning at 6 o'clock, his wife helped Red Ling shaved his beard, before he left and Red Ling Hug, let him "treat" . Red Ling at that time the situation has not optimistic, the family has been ready to breathe on the machine. That afternoon, Red Ling also called his wife and said, "I feel much more comfortable. "

But to the surprise of her family and colleagues, she died just three days later, aged 53.

Red Ling may have noticed earlier that this outbreak is unusual. According to the Beijing News, on January 17, a former laboratory student told Hong Ling that there had been a second case of new coronary pneumonia in Thailand, while the Wuhan Health Commission reported no new cases that day. "pneumonia seems to be getting worse, " Hong Ling told her students. "Go home early. "

During the Spring Festival, hongling still in the laboratory wechat group told students to pay attention to physical health. Red Ling last in the group of a message, is January 26, the school extension of the spring start of the notice.

In the eyes of her colleague Zhang Wei, Hong Ling is hardworking and down to Earth. Zhang Wei often saw him working late in the office, and he was very attentive to the dozen or so students he had brought with him.

A student said that he had been in the friend circle of the family members of students in the Academy of Sciences to raise money information, red Ling teachers also specifically asked the situation of this student, which made him feel very moved. In December 2019, when Huazhong University Exam Week came, Hongling also had a heart-to-heart talk with the undergraduate students in the laboratory. "You have a heavy workload. The work in the laboratory will be put on hold for a while and you can concentrate on reviewing. "

Red Ling often encourages students to pay attention to their grades. Once in class, he said he had been in college because of obsession with playing go delayed learning, resulting in failing the exam. "So, the result still is very important. " A student still can think of Red Ling teacher at that time bright laughter.

At the College's seminar, many teachers will ask students some sharp questions. Red Ling is always the gentle one. Ms. Hong Ling last attended a meeting in early January, when dozens of teachers and students gathered in a conference room, all unprotected.

In Zhang Wei's view, red Ling usually work pressure, physical condition is also general, the meeting is always after a while, you have to go out for a rest. Usually in addition to taking students to do projects, classes, but also need to spend energy to take care of the elderly father and mother at home, occasionally because of taking care of the family can not come to meetings. He also has a sister who spends a lot of time abroad.

Hong Ling, a native of Wuhan, returned to Wuhan in 2007 as a professor at the Huazhong University of Science and Technology and the professor, studying the molecular mechanisms of major human diseases and the regulation of signal transduction networks.

Before that, Hong Ling studied for her Ph. D. in biochemistry at the University of Arizona and did postdoctoral research at the University of California, Berkeley. She later worked at the National Laboratory of Lawrence Berkeley, Calif. .

According to Zhang Wei, a colleague, hongling's wife and children are abroad on weekdays. He returned from abroad alone, mostly to care for his parents, who are now in their 80s.

Before her death, Hong Ling devoted herself to the study of the anti-cancer mechanism of vitamin K2 on bladder cancer and the development of anti-cancer drugs. She also made a great contribution to the study of the molecular mechanism of UBIAD1, a gene related to major and rare human diseases.

Zhang Wei was shocked to learn of her death. When Zhang Wei finally met Hongling at the seminar, he was still talking about his research on cancer drugs. "I didn't expect him to go so fast and so suddenly. "

Red Ling left, his wife in the circle of friends sent a letter, "to my Love Red Ling. ". In the letter, she called her husband "red little fat" . At the end of the letter, she wrote, don't leave in such a hurry, will you come back and see me? Remember I was waiting for you.

4

Professor or hoi-bing, Faculty of Social Studies:

"He is a guiding force. "

Professor, professor, Ke Huibing, school of sociology, Hust

On February 19,2020,6:00, professor of the Social College of Huazhong University of Science and Technology, professor died due to medical treatment, had been suspected of being infected with the new coronavirus. The father of the 12-year-old was only 41 when he left. In his last conversation with his sister, he told her to leave her phone with her mother. "Her phone is too old and too small. It hurts my eyes. "

In the eyes of the students, this is an approachable, gentle and patient good teacher, "even the class to speak softly. ". Liu Wenlong, a 2014-level sociology student, told Caijing that Ke, as his undergraduate tutor, often told his students, "tell me if there are any difficulties, whether they are economic or spiritual. "

The teacher, who was generous to his students, was quickly thrown into crisis by an illness. On July 29,2019, Ke huibing was admitted to the Tongji Hospital, affiliated to the Tongji Medical College, where he was given the title of professor just a few months ago.

On February 11,2020, colleague Holger Green raised money for Ke huibing's treatment at Shuidichou.com. To treat the tumor, Ke's family has spent more than 500,000 yuan, many of which can not be reimbursed, and the cost of follow up treatment is estimated at one million yuan, according to the certification. But before this, Ke has been struggling with the disease for more than seven months.

Under the original plan, Ko would have a Hematopoietic stem cell transplant in January 2020, and his sister would be a match for him, and she would be fine. Until February 11, all the students and colleagues who saw the fund-raising message thought: Ke still has hope. They did not expect to be quarantined for suspected new coronavirus infection, eight days after the teacher left them.

Since 2020 New Year's Eve began, Ke huibing appeared repeatedly high fever, late also appeared a cough. February 4, the on-duty doctor to Ke huibing under the notice of danger, let the family to strengthen the care. "The patient is considered to have hemophagocytic syndrome as the tumor progresses and fever recurs, " the notice said. "At any time, the patient may cease to respiratory system and become life-threatening as a result of increased hemophilia and infection. "

During a CT SCAN on February 6, Ke developed symptoms of a lung infection. According to a "patient's condition sheet" issued by the hospital on February 8, Ke huibing was diagnosed as "hemophagocytic t cell lymphoma, pulmonary infection (suspected viral pneumonia) , splenomegaly, etc. . ".

According to the micro blog of Ke huibing's sister, Ke Huibing, at that time, Ms. Ke was most worried that if it was just an ordinary lung infection, the transfer of Ke, who was already weak in immunity, to a designated hospital would increase the risk of new coronavirus infection, and his family could not accompany him, it could get worse.

Ke said that at that time Ke Teacher's hospital in the same floor has been infected by seven or eight health care workers, and attending doctors have gone to the front-line anti-epidemic. She understood the difficulties of the hospital: the bottles of disinfectant in the hallways of the hospital had been empty for three days, and the nurses lacked protective clothing, "The plague makes it even more difficult to treat people with severe illnesses in Wuhan, " she wrote on her microblog.

On Feb. 6, Ms. Ke said on her Weibo account that her brother's treatment had been largely discontinued because conventional drugs and blood products were not available, and without the support of blood products, no chemotherapy or transplant treatment (high-dose chemotherapy) could be performed.

On February 10, Ke huibing entered the isolation ward. The day before, Ms. Ke saw her brother, but did not think that was the last time. Brother was quarantined a day later, Ms. Ke found that he did not reply to the message in time before. The family asked Ke huibing situation, he only replied two words "okay. ".

Ms. Ke knows that her brother has always been "good news, not bad news. ". Even if their high fever does not subside, in bed can not take care of themselves, also do not want to let the family worry.

After two days of isolation, Ke huibing had his first nucleic acid test, which was negative, which was "the only good news" for his family. The family's hope was to wait for the results of a second nucleic acid test, and if it was still negative, they could transfer to a hospital. "there is a silver lining. We must never give up. ".

Meanwhile, Ms Ke has repeatedly asked for help on Weibo, hoping to have the opportunity to transfer out of town for treatment or transfer to a hospital for treatment, while her family members are at home "Paresthesia" . But Ke huibing's family, students did not expect is to enter the isolation ward, chemotherapy stopped after the rapid deterioration of the condition, February 19 at 6:00 a.m. , Ke huibing died.

When the family arrived at the hospital, due to ward isolation, can not see the teacher Ke one last time. Looking at the funeral parlour car will Miss Ke sent away, the family can only do in the roadside kneeling to send.

Seven days after Ke's death, Ms. Ke wrote on Weibo: It is the love of life that has kept my brother going for more than half a year, but I didn't expect to leave in a hurry because of the isolation and stop treatment.

Ke likes to take pictures of his family, every time after shooting will be developed into a photo album and Photo Wall; Wu Da Cherry Blossoms, Ke teacher will ride a bicycle with his sister to see the cherry blossoms, even if full of sweat is also full of enthusiasm.

He also influenced students with a positive, sunny attitude, and when he met students from poor families, he would talk about his experience from a rural child to a professor. "The teacher said there was nothing impossible about sticking with it. He was a guiding force, " said one student.

Ke grew up in the countryside, where his parents and brother still live. Wife's a teacher, 12-year-old kid, heavy family. After Ke's death, his family said on Weibo that they did not need any help and "hope that people will pay attention to the survival of other non-severe pneumonia patients. ".

Ke has always been simple and low-key. Many students were in the circle of friends to see the water drop chip retweets link, only to know that the teacher is sick. One student said he remembered Ke as a simple and lovely teacher in the classroom, see the teacher in the hospital bed emaciated look, "immediately choked. "

A colleague said he was in good spirits when he visited Ke at the hospital in July 2019 and told him to take care of his health. After being diagnosed with cancer, Ke huibing continued to work and went to Xi'an for a meeting. In October, he was still directing students'essays during the opening defense.

Ke huibing previously studied social security and social welfare and chaired two National Social Science Foundation projects. In the certification message, Ke's younger brother, Sun Jian, said that when Ke finished his doctorate, he gave up a high-paying career as a teacher, thinking "China's social security is just starting, want to do a good job of research, teaching and educating people. ".

Student Liu Wenlong still remembers a class in his sophomore year. Ke spent a long time explaining how "love" manifests in social assistance. That class he mentioned the most one sentence, in the memory of his classmates, but also a footnote to teacher Ke's life, "love is enduring patience, and kindness. ".

(Zhang Wei is using a pseudonym, and intern Ma Kexin contributed to this report, thanking all those who helped during the interview.)

(this article first appeared in Caijing magazine on March 2,2020.)
